item.title: Using Ruby to find a cycle in a graph of Puppet dependencies
item.description: Today, I had a small issue while using Puppet. To make it quick: I got a circular dependency in my Puppet recipes and Puppet failed with a verbose but not so helpful message: err: Could not apply complete catalog: Found dependency cycles in the following relationships: User[root] => File[/usr/share/locale/locale.alias], Package[python-setuptools] ... # INSERT TONS of other dependencies here ... try using the '--graph' option and open the '.dot' files in OmniGraffle or GraphViz Of course, I tried the ‘–graph’ option but, due to it’s size, the generated diagram was anything but readable.
